featured.text: Medvedev Vladimir, 43, and his son, Maxsine, 14, sailed from an unnamed eastern Russian seaport on August 18, to begin an ambitious around-the-world cruise.

definition.zh_def: 最大正弦值，通常用於數學和工程領域。
definition.en_def: The maximum value of the sine function, often used in mathematics and engineering.
definition.example: The maxsine of the angle is crucial for calculating the wave's amplitude.
